title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.2 - Prior consultation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.2 - Prior consultation

State Regulations

Preparation of the application on form FB-101 will be
facilitated by prior consultation between the applicant and representatives of
the Banking Department. Arrangements for such a conference may be made and
copies of form FB-101 may be obtained through the Foreign and Wholesale Banks

Division of the Banking Department, at the address set forth in section
1.1
of Supervisory Policy G 1 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
101.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
